languages.text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.
languages.original_text: Patriarch mindcontrols one enemy, forcing him to fight against his allies for 2 rounds. Can be cast only on target with Frightened debuff. Patriarch restores 10% of his HP

traits.locale_text: The Sire gains control over an enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies for 2 rounds. Can only be used against a target with the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect. When applied, the Sire restores 10% of his maximum wounds.

The Sire gains control over an enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies for 2 rounds. Can only be used against a target with the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect. When applied, the Sire restores 10% of his maximum wounds.

The Sire gains control over an enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

The Sire gains control over an enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

languages.text: Patriarch mindcontrols one enemy, forcing him to fight against his allies for 2 rounds. Can be cast only on target with Frightened debuff. Patriarch restores 10% of his HP
languages.translation_comment:
V глава. Первый квест Маражая
Особая абилка демонеток — берут под контроль одного из компаньонов игрока. Компаньон находится под контролем демонеток до того момента, пока он не умрет, либо не умрет демонетка

traits.locale_text: Patriarch mindcontrols one enemy, forcing him to fight against his allies for 2 rounds. Can be cast only on target with Frightened debuff. Patriarch restores 10% of his HP

languages.text: El objetivo del progenitor hace una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40. Si falla la prueba, se ve obligado a luchar contra sus aliados durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Solo se puede usar contra un objetivo que sufra el efecto de {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}aterrado{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo del progenitor hace una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40. Si falla la prueba, se ve obligado a luchar contra sus aliados durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Solo se puede usar contra un objetivo que sufra el efecto de {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}aterrado{/g}.

El progenitor se apodera de un enemigo, obligándolo a luchar contra sus aliados durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Solo se puede usar contra un objetivo con el efecto {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}aterrado{/g}. Al aplicar este efecto, el progenitor recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.

languages.text: サイアのターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ウィルパワー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗力{/g} テストに-40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課す。テストに失敗すると、ターゲットは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、味方との戦闘を強いられる。{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}怯え{/g} の効果を受けているターゲットに対してのみ使用できる。
languages.original_text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: サイアのターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ウィルパワー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗力{/g} テストに-40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課す。テストに失敗すると、ターゲットは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、味方との戦闘を強いられる。{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}怯え{/g} の効果を受けているターゲットに対してのみ使用できる。
サイアは敵1体をコントロールし、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その味方と戦わせる。{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}怯え{/g}効果を受けているターゲットのみを対象とできる。適用された場合、サイアは{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%を回復する。

languages.text: 虫群族长通过精神力量影响一名敌人，受影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会强制攻击盟友，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力只能对处于{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}惊惧不已{/g}状态的目标使用。
languages.original_text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 虫群族长通过精神力量影响一名敌人，受影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会强制攻击盟友，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力只能对处于{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}惊惧不已{/g}状态的目标使用。
虫群族长控制一名敌人，迫使该名敌人攻击同伴，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此能力只能对处于{g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}惊惧不已{/g}状态的目标使用。当使用此能力时，虫群族长恢复10%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Das Ziel des Schöpfer macht eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstands{/g}-probe mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −40. Misslingt die Probe, muss das Ziel 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang gegen seine Verbündeten kämpfen. Kann nur gegen ein Ziel eingesetzt werden, das mit dem {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}Entsetzt{/g}-Effekt belegt ist.
languages.original_text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel des Schöpfer macht eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstands{/g}-probe mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -40. Misslingt die Probe, muss das Ziel 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang gegen seine Verbündeten kämpfen. Kann nur gegen ein Ziel eingesetzt werden, das mit dem {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}Entsetzt{/g}-Effekt belegt ist.

languages.text: La cible du Sire doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elle est forcée à se battre contre ses alliés pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ne peut être utilisé que contre une cible sous l'effet {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}Terreur{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Sire's target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} test with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, that target is forced to fight against its allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target suffering the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: La cible du Sire doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -40. En cas d'échec, elle est forcée à se battre contre ses alliés pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ne peut être utilisé que contre une cible sous l'effet {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}Terreur{/g}.

La cible du Sire doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -40. En cas d'échec, elle est forcée à se battre contre ses alliés pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ne peut être utilisé que contre une cible sous l'effet {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}Terreur{/g}.

languages.text: Цель Предка выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40. В случае провала она вынуждена сражаться против собственных союзников в течение 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}. Может применяться только к цели, на которую действует эффект {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}в ужасе{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Sire gains control over an enemy, forcing them to fight against their allies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Can only be used against a target with the {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}terrified{/g} effect. When applied, the Sire restores 10% of his {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Предок берет цель под контроль, заставляя ее сражаться против союзников в течение 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}. Может применяться только к цели, на которую действует эффект {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}в ужасе{/g}. При применении Предок восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

Предок берет цель под контроль, заставляя ее сражаться против союзников в течение 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}. Может применяться только к цели, на которую действует эффект {g|f:c24f558c424947de8d1ecb834526d841}в ужасе{/g}. При применении Предок восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.
